title: Kodomo no Hitomi
sinopse: Misaki has been living with his child alone while he grows hatred to his older brother, Hitoshi. But one day he finds him infront of his house with a strange man saying that Hitoshi encountered an accident, lost his memories and now has a mindset of a 6-year old Hitoshi! Will Misaki be willing to accept Hitoshi as his older brother or as a...?
